channel.title: Huuuge client problem!

item.title: Huuuge client problem!
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

Find that first line and try making it …

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " has logged out";

Read full topic

item.title: Huuuge client problem!
item.dc:creator: @newservermaker newservermaker
